scripts.publish-core:patch: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version patch && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
scripts.publish-core:minor: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version minor && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
scripts.publish-core:major: cd projects/rvn-core && npm version major && ng build rvn-core --prod && xcopy "./src/lib/styles" "../../dist/rvn-core/styles" /E /I /Y && cd ../../dist/rvn-core && npm publish
